    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze(char[][] maze,
            int mode)
        Instantiates a new maze.
        Parameters:
        maze - matrix of char representing the maze
        mode - number of mode 1:STILL 2:MOVE 3:SLEEP

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update(char dir)
        Updates the game moving the hero in the direction he/she chose, changing the status and moving the dragon if necessary.
        Parameters:
        dir - represents the direction taken by the hero north(N or n), south(S or s), east (E or e) or west(o or o)
        Returns:
        the status of the game 0 if still running, 1 if hero left the maze and 2 if dragon kills the hero
